title: Ecommerce Manager - ( Remote, Face-to-face )
description: As a marketing expert and e-commerce director, I lead the implementation of content strategies and advertising campaigns on Meta Ads and Google Ads, while training and leading teams in sales, customer service, picking, and packing. I oversee the website, design web applications, and conduct result analysis to achieve sales and profitability targets.

title: Designer Web - ( Remote)
description: As the marketing expert and web designer for a service-based company, I lead content strategy implementation, measure campaign effectiveness on Meta Ads and Google Ads, and design web applications. I analyze results to ensure sales and profitability goals are met, striving for continuous improvement and optimization.
